textType: The premier incubator and regulatory sandbox in Central Vietnam. We empower startups to build Innovative Fintech solutions (with a focus in AI, Blockchain, and Sustainable Finance) under a secure and international legal framework with privileged access to the fast growing Vietnamese market.
The most dynamic technology hub in Central Vietnam

aboutDAB.title: The Future of Finance Starts in Da Nang
aboutDAB.subtitle: We are building the infrastructure for the next generation of financial technology in Vietnam's most livable city.
aboutDAB.dflDescription: At the core of the ecosystem is DFL. We are the operational engine connecting policy with practice. DFL provides the physical space, the data infrastructure, and the AI tools necessary for startups to build compliant, cutting-edge financial products. We bridge the gap between traditional banking and the decentralized future.

teamFeatures.title: International Team
teamFeatures.description: Bringing diverse perspectives and global experience to drive innovation in Vietnam.

teamFeatures.title: Local Expertise
teamFeatures.description: Deep understanding of the Vietnamese market, regulations, and cultural nuance.

teamFeatures.title: World Experts in Fintech x AI
teamFeatures.description: Pioneering the intersection of financial services and artificial intelligence.

aboutDAB.danangDescription: Known for its stunning coastline and high quality of life, Da Nang is rapidly transforming into Vietnam's premier hub for technology and innovation. With a strategic location, modern infrastructure, and a forward-thinking government, the city attracts top talent and investment from across the globe.

danangFeatures.title: High Quality of Life
danangFeatures.description: A perfect blend of urban convenience and natural beauty, attracting global talent.

danangFeatures.title: Strategic Location
danangFeatures.description: Central gateway connecting major Asian economies and markets.

danangFeatures.title: Skilled Educated Young Workforce
danangFeatures.description: Access to a vibrant talent pool from top universities and technical institutes.

aboutDAB.vifcDescription: The VIFC is a policy sandbox and economic zone designed to rival global financial hubs. It offers regulatory flexibility, tax incentives, and a world-class environment for financial institutions, fintech startups, and venture capital firms to collaborate and scale.

vifcFeatures.title: Policy Sandbox
vifcFeatures.description: A safe environment to test and deploy innovative financial technologies.

vifcFeatures.title: Robust Legal Framework
vifcFeatures.description: Clear regulations and protections creating a secure environment for innovation.

vifcFeatures.title: Global Connectivity
vifcFeatures.description: Seamless integration with international financial markets and partners.

whyChoose.title: Building the
whyChoose.description: Da Nang FinTech Lab (DFL) is a strategic initiative under the International Financial Centre (IFC) Da Nang.
whyChoose.subtitle1: Complementing the Ecosystems of HCMC & Singapore
whyChoose.description1: Operated by Crossfund and Vcap Partners, DFL is designed to position Da Nang as a key node in Southeast Asia's financial innovation network.
whyChoose.description2: We are not just building a workspace; we are constructing a regulatory sandbox and innovation hub that leverages Da Nang's unique advantages - high quality of life, emerging tech talent, and strategic location - to foster the next generation of green finance and digital assets.
whyChoose.missionDescription: Ambitious targets driving real economic impact for Central Vietnam.

stats.startupsDescription: Nurturing high-growth ventures in AI, Blockchain, and Green Finance.
stats.jobsDescription: Creating careers for the next generation of Vietnamese tech talent.
stats.investmentDescription: Direct foreign investment into Da Nang's digital economy.

forWho.title: Vietnam's First
forWho.description: A secure testing environment supervised by the State Bank of Vietnam (SBV). Pilot new technologies - including digital assets and P2P lending - safely and legally.

features.title: Safe Testing Ground
features.description: Test your innovations in a live market environment with regulatory guidance.

features.title: SBV Oversight
features.description: Direct supervision and regular feedback loops with the State Bank of Vietnam ensure your product meets compliance standards from day one.

features.title: Live Testing
features.description: Deploy to real users in a controlled environment. Validate your business model and technology with actual market data.

features.title: New Frontiers
features.description: Specifically designed for emerging technologies including Digital Assets, P2P Lending, and Blockchain-based financial services.

processSteps.title: Application & Review
processSteps.description: Submit your proposal. We evaluate based on innovation, consumer benefit, and readiness.

processSteps.title: Testing Parameters
processSteps.description: Define scope, duration, and safeguards. Set clear KPIs for success.

processSteps.title: Live Deployment
processSteps.description: Launch to a limited user base under supervision. Regular reporting and monitoring.

processSteps.title: Exit & Scale
processSteps.description: Upon successful completion, receive authorization to scale operations across Vietnam.

features.title: Our Core Capabilities
features.description: Combining blockchain technology and artificial intelligence to create innovative solutions for the future

items.title: Blockchain Innovation
items.description: Developing secure and scalable blockchain solutions for enterprise and public applications.

items.title: Artificial Intelligence
items.description: Creating AI models tailored for Vietnamese language, culture, and business needs.

items.title: Security First
items.description: Implementing world-class security protocols to protect data and transactions.

items.title: High Performance
items.description: Optimizing systems for speed and efficiency without compromising quality.

items.title: Data Analytics
items.description: Advanced analytics and insights powered by machine learning algorithms.

items.title: Smart Contracts
items.description: Developing intelligent smart contracts for automation and transparency.

location.title: Located in Beautiful Da Nang
location.description: A coastal paradise where innovation meets nature - the perfect environment for creativity and breakthrough research

features.title: Strategic Location
features.description: Da Nang is Vietnam's most liveable city, positioned perfectly in Central Vietnam with world-class infrastructure and connectivity to major tech hubs across Asia.

features.title: Coastal Inspiration
features.description: Surrounded by pristine beaches and the Han River, our location offers a refreshing environment that stimulates creativity and innovation.

features.title: Year-Round Excellence
features.description: Perfect climate and modern amenities make Da Nang an ideal location for attracting top talent from around the world.

features.title: Cultural Heritage
features.description: Close proximity to UNESCO World Heritage sites like Hoi An Ancient Town and the Imperial City of Hue provides rich cultural context for our work.

contact.title: Ready to build with DFL?
contact.description: Sign up for a lab tour or schedule a discussion. Let's build the future of AI in Da Nang together.
